Item 7.01 - Regulation FD Disclosure.content: On June 2, 2022, Microsoft Corporation updated our guidance for the quarter ending June 30, 2022 due to unfavorable foreign exchange rate movement in the quarter through May. A slide deck with our revised guidance is furnished as Exhibit 99.1 to this report.
